# Shopping Mall E-Commerce Project - Setup Progress

## Project Overview
Spring Boot shopping mall application with customer management, product catalog, shopping cart, order management, and user authentication.

## Setup Progress

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [x] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Technology Stack
- Backend: Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring Data JPA
- Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- Database: H2 (development), MySQL (production ready)
- Build Tool: Maven

## Project Structure Created
✅ Complete Spring Boot backend with REST APIs
✅ JPA entities for Customer, Product, Cart, Order, Category, Address, Payment, Role
✅ Repository layer with custom queries
✅ Service layer with business logic
✅ Security configuration with JWT authentication
✅ Complete HTML/CSS/JavaScript frontend
✅ Responsive design with modern UI
✅ Data initialization with sample data
